author: Ed Crocker
description:
There’s a moment in one of my favourite horror flicks, John Carpenter’s The Thing, which for me is greater than any of the brilliant gore scenes around it, or even that blood testing scene. It’s very simple. The camera focuses far longer than it should on some of the characters in the besieged Arctic base. […]

The post REVIEW: The Extra by Annie Neugebauer appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: The Extra by Annie Neugebauer
